arts.ttl: Stade Brest routs Salzburg 4-0 for 2 wins from first 2 games in Champions League
arts.sum: It was the team’s first Champions League match at home since a 1-1 draw with Barcelona in February 2010, when Zlatan Ibrahimović scored for the visitors. Senegalese forward Abdallah Sima netted twice to take his tally to three goals in two games after he scored in Brest’s tournament-opening 2-1 win over Austrian champion Sturm Graz.

arts.ttl: MATCH REPORT | Salzburg 0-4 Brest: Pirates top Champions League standings
arts.sum: UEFA Champions League 2024/25, Matchday 2, 1/10/24 – Red Bull Salzburg v Stade Brestois 29 (Red Bull Arena) After defeating Sturm Graz in the opening matchday, Brest faced another Austrian…

arts.ttl: Official | Oumar Solet joins Udinese after RB Salzburg termination
arts.sum: Udinese Calcio have confirmed the signing of Oumar Solet (24) on a free transfer. The centre-back has signed a contract that will keep him in the north of Italy until…

arts.ttl: Brest aim to achieve rare feat for French clubs in Europe
arts.sum: Stade Brestois will seek a second successive victory in the UEFA Champions League when they head to Austria on Tuesday for a date with Red Bull Salzburg. A victory for…

arts.ttl: Brest predicted XI v RB Salzburg: Jordan Amavi dropped, Mama Baldé to start
arts.sum: Eric Roy has made the decision to drop Jordan Amavi from the Stade Brestois squad that have made the trip to Austria to face Red Bull Salzburg in the UEFA…

arts.ttl: Champions League predictions: Tuesday's matchday 2 fixtures
arts.sum: Inter, who made a huge statement on matchday one by stifling Man City at the Etihad Stadium, will expect to kick on and consolidate with Red Star Belgrade at home. Looking to get off the mark for the season, Manchester City travel to Slovakia to face Slovan Bratislava, while another heavyweight in Barcelona are home to Young Boys of Bern.
Aidan Perkins runs through all 18 fixtures on Matchday Two in the new League phase of the Champions League with a score prediction for each game.
